ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:main
ctl:test.ctl:param: An updateSequence value higher than the current updateSequence value advertised in the capabilities XML.
An updateSequence value lower than the current updateSequence value advertised in the capabilities XML.
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The GetCapabilities request behaves properly.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:requests
ctl:test.ctl:param: An updateSequence value higher than the current updateSequence value advertised in the capabilities XML.
An updateSequence value lower than the current updateSequence value advertised in the capabilities XML.
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Each request parameter behaves properly.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:xml-validation
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The Capabilities XML validates.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:capability-metadata
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The capability metadata is advertised correctly.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:layer-properties
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The layer properties are advertised correctly.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:dimensions
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Dimensions are declared properly.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:each-format
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: For {$format}, when the FORMAT parameter is set to that format, the MIME type of the response matches that format.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:no-format
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When no FORMAT parameter is supplied, the response is capabilities XML with MIME type text/xml.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:invalid-format
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When an invalid FORMAT parameter is supplied, the response is capabilities XML with MIME type text/xml.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:updatesequence-ignored
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When no updateSequence number is advertised in the Capabilities XML, The UPDATESEQUENCE parameter is ignored.

xsl:when.ctl:message: An updateSequence number is advertised in the Capabilities XML.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:updatesequence-current
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When a GetCapabilities request is made with an UPDATESEQUENCE parameter set to the current update sequence value, then the server returns a valid exception (code=CurrentUpdateSequence).

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: No updateSequence number is advertised in the Capabilities XML.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:updatesequence-lower
ctl:test.ctl:param: An updateSequence value higher than the current updateSequence value advertised in the capabilities XML.
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When a GetCapabilities request is made with an UPDATESEQUENCE parameter set to a value lower than the current update sequence value, then the server returns capabilities XML.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: No updateSequence number is advertised in the Capabilities XML.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:updatesequence-higher
ctl:test.ctl:param: An updateSequence value higher than the current updateSequence value advertised in the capabilities XML.
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When a GetCapabilities request is made with an UPDATESEQUENCE parameter set to a value higher than the current update sequence value, then the server returns an exception (code=InvalidUpdateSequence).

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: No updateSequence number is advertised in the Capabilities XML.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:normative-schema
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The normative content of the schema document referred to by the schemaLocation attribute in the capabilities document is identical to the normative content of the on-line schema referred to in Annex E.1.

xsl:when.ctl:message: A schemaLocation attribute is required on the root element.
The schemaLocation attribute must provide a schema for the http://www.opengis.net/wms namespace.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Error: The schema does not define correctly.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:validate-using-schemaLocation
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The response to a GetCapabilities request validates against the schema(s) provided with the schemaLocation attribute.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Apache Xerces is used to validate the capabilities document.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:capability-onlineresource
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Each OnlineResource URL intended for HTTP Get requests in the capabilities document is a URL prefix
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Each OnlineResource URL must ends in a ? or both contain a ? and end in an &.

xsl:if.ctl:message: The HTTP Get OnlineResource URL for the request is not a prefix.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:capability-xml-getcapabilities-format
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The server advertises the text/xml format for the GetCapabilities operation.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:capability-xml-exception-format
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The server advertises the XML service exception format.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:resource-format
ctl:test.ctl:param: The advertised format for the resource
The actual format of the resource
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The MIME-type returned for {$resource} is {$advertised-format}.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Error: The actual MIME-type for '' is ''

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:resource-size
ctl:test.ctl:param: The advertised width for the resource
The advertised height for the resource
The actual width of the resource
The actual height of the resource
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The size of {$resource} is {$advertised-width}x{$advertised-height}.

xsl:when.ctl:message: Error: Could not determine size of ''.
Error: The actual size of '' is x

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:logourls
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The metadata for each of the LogoURL resources is correct.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:bbox-crs-advertised
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: There are no BoundingBoxes provided for a CRS that is not advertised.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: Layer has a BoundingBox element for CRS , but there is no corresponding CRS element.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:bbox-present
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Every named layer in the capabilities document has at least one BoundingBox element (direct or inherited).

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: Layer does not contain a BoundingBox element.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:bbox-distinct-crs
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: For each of the layer elements in the capabilities document, each BoundingBox on the layer states a different CRS.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: Layer has multiple BoundingBox elements for CRS .

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:crs-auto2-declarations
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: None of the CRS declarations in the AUTO2 namespace contain factor, longitude, or latitude variables.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: Variables are supplied with CRS in Layer .

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:crs-present
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Every named layer in the capabilities document has at least one CRS element that is either stated explicitly or inherited from a parent Layer.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:crs-for-all-layers
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The root layer lists all CRSs that are common to all subsidiary layers.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Error: CRS is not listed on the root layer, but is common to all of the subsidiary named layers.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:dataurls
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: For each of the DataURL elements in the capabilities document, the MIME-type returned by the resource is the same as the Format element.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:ex_geobbox-present
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Every named layer in the capabilities document has an EX_GeographicBoundingBox element that is either stated explicitly or inherited from a parent Layer.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:ex_geobbox-coordinates
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: For each EX_GeographicBoundingBox element, westBoundLongitude is less than eastBoundLongitude and southBoundLatitude is less than northBoundLatitude.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:featurelisturls
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: For each of the FeatureListURL elements in the capabilities document, the MIME-type returned by the resource is the same as the Format element.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:authorityurl-unique
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: There are no child Layer elements in the capabilities document that define an AuthorityURL with the same name attribute as one inherited from a parent layer.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: The AuthorityURL is redefined in Layer .

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:identifier-matches-authorityurl
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: There are no Layer elements in the capabilities document that declare an Identifier without also declaring or inheriting a corresponding AuthorityURL.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: There is no corresponding AuthorityURL for Identifier in Layer .

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:metadataurls
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: For each of the MetadataURL elements in the capabilities document, the MIME-type returned by the resource is the same as the Format element.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:style-unique
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: There are no child layers in the capabilities document that redefine a Style with the same name as one inherited from one of its parents.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: The Style is redefined in Layer .

ctl:with-param.name: resource
ctl:with-param.label: the StyleSheetURL resource
ctl:with-param.label-expr: concat('the StyleSheetURL for Style ', ../wms:Name, ' in Layer ', ../../wms:Name)

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The metadata for the StyleURL resource in each Style element is correct.

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:dims-time
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All declarations for the time dimension use 'ISO8601' for units.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: Error: The units attribute is not "ISO8601" for the time dimension in the layer titled "".

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:dims-elevation-crs88
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: No declarations for the elevation dimension using the vertical datum CRS:88 use a unitSymbol other than 'm'.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: Error: The unitSymbol attribute is not "m" for the elevation dimension using the vertical datum CRS:88 in the layer titled "".

ctl:test.name: getcapabilities:dims-no-redeclarations
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: There are no Dimension elements in the capabilities document that are redeclared using conflicting unit or unitSymbol attributes.

xsl:for-each.ctl:message: The Dimension is redeclared in the layer titled "" using conflicting units and/or unitSymbol attributes.
